website_summaries.verdict: An all-in-one kit that gives your child an early start on letters, numbers, and more. Includes reusable writing boards instead of consumable pages.
pros: Designed for lessons of 20 minutes per day
Includes reading flashcards, dry erase board for writing letters and numbers, and matching cards
Flip book helps teach addition and subtraction

customer_reviews.title: You're Your Kids 1st Teacher▪️Awesome for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My toddler went to a preschool that taught him all letters, sounds, 1-10, and shapes and colors by 18 months. When we moved I didn't want to lose what he had learned so we started with the Teach my Toddler kit and then the Teach My Preschooler. He's just turned 3 and counts to 100(thanks to the cards) he prefers to draw on paper with crayons but is drawing shapes and numbers. You are your kids first teacher, dont wait for school to teach them...their little minds are ready. Your toddler can read if you teach them. Start with these kits.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMom

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend to buy it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter 4yo. Every day we learn something new from this set. We love poster with numbers, we almost every day learn new numbers. There is very nice train with numbers - it really helps to kids to learn. Also there is magnetic board and my daughter loves to draw shapes and other things there. I would recommend to buy it! It’s vwry interesting and almost 4montha gone how we buy it and we didn’t use even half from this box.
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The quality control on this product is ABYSMAL.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my pre-school age daughter to attempt teaching her the basics on our own. We received duplicates of some letter outlines to trace while getting no number ones. The flash cards are missing some letters and numbers while having duplicates of others. The reward tin, which was never opened, had a DEAD ROLLIE POLLIE in it. The magnetic writing board already has dead spots that don't appear when writing on it. I have no words for how disappointed I am in this set. Save you money and get something made with more quality control than this.
customer_reviews.author: Rojer Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Missing key components and incorrectly assembled
customer_reviews.text: Provides a good basic organization outline and appears to have appropriate content (I just received and have not administered yet) but kit we received was missing key resource components (reading flashcards), which, likely occurred due to an assembly error because the reading resources were in a printing resource folder—there were two printing folders and one contained printing materials and the other actually contained the reading materials but not all of them. Confused? —exactly what I don’t need right now so I would not recommend the product unless the organizational outline the kit provides is all you are looking for and you are cool with supplementing and reorganizing the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Amber-Rose Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product over a year ago, with the toddler box. We have only now opened it as my daughter is now ready for some of the activities. This product is awful quality. The writing board that comes with the product is practically useless as the pen broke in many pieces in my daughter’s hand. Lots of small broken dangerous bit. This was her first use of the board - which we can’t use due to not having a pen for it and instead a dangerous broken pen in bits.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Holmes

customer_reviews.title: This Kit is a great tool for teaching
customer_reviews.text: This Kit is a great tool for teaching. For all of the items included, the Teach My Preschooler Learning Kit is very reasonably priced compared to some other kits I have researched. I would have loved to have this while I taught preschool in the classroom. I use it now at home with my 3 1/2 year old son and we love it. We make it an exciting time when I pull out the learning box. The books walk you through what to say to your child as you present the lessons. I plan to use this and the Teach my Toddler set when my younger son reaches the appropriate age.
customer_reviews.author: VonneNicole

customer_reviews.title: Needs a teaching guide
customer_reviews.text: I wish it would’ve come with a teaching guide of some sort. I guess we just basically paid for materials, but it needs a daily guide. If I had bought it from a local store, I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal and My Son Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 4 year old and we use it all of the time. My son loves it and even uses the toddler one to review lots of the concepts. Some of the preschool concepts are things that he is still learning. We should be able to integrate this into his learning for awhile. I definitely feel that it was more than worth the cost and would recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Collaso

customer_reviews.title: “Teach Teach!”
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I bought this prematurely because it was on sale and I love the “teach my baby” and “teach my toddler” models we have used. As an educator myself and after looking through this, I can predict my son will love this edition, and I know it will be beneficial to his learning as the other editions have been! He runs around the house saying “teach teach” until I open up the toddler version we’re using now!
customer_reviews.author: SAHM Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful system for busy parents!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit for my 3 year old. I am so excited about the mini-books that teach the child how to read! One of the books was missing a set of cards. I emailed the company & promptly received the missing card set. I purchased the Teach My Baby kit for my newest child. We would definitely recommend this brand of early learning products! I feel very blessed that a friend gave us the Teach My Toddler kit a couple years ago. Great system for busy parents/caregivers!
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set to use with my son and was excited to get it in its nice packaging. But it was missing a circle person in the math set. This was very disappointing Because my three year old noticed it within 30 seconds of playing the addition game. I’d love a fifth character. I ended up contacting the company, and CEO emailed me back within an hour and offered to replace the missing piece. Great service!
customer_reviews.author: Acesteacher

customer_reviews.title: Everything is too sharp and cheap looking.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was cheap looking. The cards and poster items were waaaay too sharp to the point where I did not want my toddlers using them. I couldn't use them myself without getting poked or scratched. I have many card decks from the dollar store that look better quality and feel better quality. The idea is cute but had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great but.....
customer_reviews.text: I love the Teach My collection I’ve had one for each stage now we’re at the preschool stage and I love this collection I only have an issue with the reading part of this collection I’m missing step one so He won’t be able to practice sounds A-I Which is a bummer because my son enjoys our learning time!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Could be better quality products.
customer_reviews.text: We had the teach my baby and loved it. So it just natural for us to want to continue on. I was very disappointed when we opened the folder that the sketch board for tracing letters was broken and cracked. It was very cheap and poor quality. The instructions were a little vague but not horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tool to pair with actual curriculum
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great. Definitely a great value but the quality of the books was my least favorite. I can hardly turn the pages without tearing them forget my 4year old. Very thin and dinky. The treasure box idea is cute. I filled it with our own sticker (it comes empty) I like the fact that each subject has its own little plastic folder to keep it sorted. I do feel like it’s more fluff than actual material. The math only has 5 Foam counters. All in all it’s a great gift giver not so much a homeschool curriculum more like just an extra tool.
customer_reviews.author: Xenia

customer_reviews.title: A lot of missing items
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this to help my child with schooling, but there was a lot of missing letters, numbers, shapes, books and etc. there was also duplicates of the items too. I wish it were better !
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Figg

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic!! GET THEM!
customer_reviews.text: We have the Teach My Baby, Toddler, & Preschooler Boxes! LOVE THEM. I’ll be honest, I’ve even had to hid them before because my daughter constantly wants to do “school boxes” haha. Each box has different topic categories, & we love making new games or ways to play with them. I have recommended them to so many people! They are so great!
customer_reviews.author: K.R.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost. Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: This sounded like a great idea. But the writing board was broke I had to super clue it. The clear traceable parts are missing some letters or numbers or have duplicates. The reading part is missing the 3rd book out of 10. Really cheap poor quality. I do not suggest this.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great learning product for preschoolers and little ones!
customer_reviews.text: Great product but only gave it a three star because of one part came broken. The magnetic drawing pad is what came broken but we don’t care for those so we’re not gonna worry about trying to return it, we will just replace it with a whiteboard. If it wasn’t for that one item being broken it would’ve been a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Best at home teaching set
customer_reviews.text: I got the "Teach my toddler" set before i got these. Everything in these kits has helped my daughter to learn her numbers, letters and shapes over the past few months. Its also a great way for me to spend time with my daughter doing something constructive. She loves "teaching" me as well :)
customer_reviews.author: joanne

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I'm really excited for this. It's very organized and it seems to be something most children would have fun with while learning. I bought it as a Christmas gift for my son and I'm so tempted to give it to him now!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Griffin

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. This has been great for helping my daughter (2.5) learn her numbers and shapes and has even started writing letters and numbers using the tracing pad. Very very happy with this purchase. Great value for what you receive too!
customer_reviews.author: TwoYearOldMom❤️

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Kit for boys with short attention span
customer_reviews.text: My son is a spirited almost 5 year old. He has an aversion to drawing and pretty much any learning activity that does not involved trains. He loves doing the tracing with me and has built his confidence! Also, AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE from the manufaturer. Amazon originally sent me the wrong kit and I missed the return window. They never responded to my request. I emailed the company and they immediately sent me a replacement, despite not having received any money from the original purchase. Women owned businesses ROCK!
customer_reviews.author: Betina Schonberger

customer_reviews.title: Seems great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this especially for the price. I like how everything is neatly separated. My 3 year old gets so excited when it's time to "go to school" as she calls it. We haven't done all of it yet, we've just been using the numbers and the flash cards which both seem to be great learning tools. I'm excited to keep using this and to see what comes out of it for my girl. I recommend at least giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: A E

customer_reviews.title: Great educational tool
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this set! He loves train cars and the cards have been wonderful in teaching him proper counting. After purchasing his learning and focus have increased drastically. Great tool!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Turkovich

customer_reviews.title: Advanced
customer_reviews.text: We had previously done teach my toddler kit which was absolutely perfect and just what he needed so when he had completed and learned everything from that kit we moved on to teach my preschooler. This kit is a huge difference from previous. The printing and counting is great but math and reading is too advanced for a three year old just starting. Granted my son won’t be 3 till 4 more months but there should be some type of transitioning with the two kits.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected
customer_reviews.text: This comes with so many items! Where i live there are not enough preschool teachers so they only take children who need it. My son is advanced so he does not need it. This will help us teach him at home until he can go to kindergarten. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you keep this away from other toys! This is to be used with an adult and child
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in today and I’m so excited to use this for my future preschooler. She’s a little advanced as I’ve been working with her quite a bit with her letters and numbers, but this gives the perfect amount of challenge. This is such a great value and I love how everything is organized in separate pouches. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Contact seller?
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Just got it today, and we are excited to get learning. However, one of the books are wrong. The correct outer page but duplicate inside from another book. How do I contact the seller? We also bought the toddler addition last year and loved it. I highly reccomend these.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Item missing from product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to use with my four year old daughter and in reviewing the box, daughter got excited about the printing portion and wanted me to show her the magic board...however, when check the contents of the kit I got two reading pouches, one numbers 1-100 pouch, and one math pouch. So no printing pouch...I am very disappointed and so is she. Otherwise, I find the other contents fascinating and my daughter is also happy.
customer_reviews.author: Keneisha Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to help him learn during the lockdown with the covid 19 and he’s really learning and he likes it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Caity Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Eh...wouldn't repurchase but not trying to return.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't as impressed as I thought I would be. Some of the piece are really cheap. While my daughter is doing really well with the products...I just expected more out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathrin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the low price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my three year old and it's an excellent product for the price. He loves the reading, printing and Number sections. My only complaint is that I wish the storage was better for the letter/number/shape cards.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Helping hand
customer_reviews.text: I like this, and so does my 4 year old! The only thing I was missing the number 2’s and one number 8. Other than that, it’s simple and is useful. It not only helps me understand what and how to teach my little one, but she enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Everything in one package. Ideal when you are teaching more than one grade level. Self contained.
customer_reviews.author: Connie R. Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Good but some parts cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today. The drawing tablet was very cheap and Broken in the package. Had to throw it away. The rest looks like my 4 year old will enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: TiffMurray

customer_reviews.title: Broken before we could even use it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used teach my toddler and now preschooler. I usually love thing things. But the magnet doodle is already broken. This is the first time we even used it. No very happy. Other than that, great learning tools and tips.
customer_reviews.author: Jaedyn P

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome next level step for my 4 year old. We have already gone through 3 preschool work books and they just are repeats for him. So this will help him to read which we have already started before. But this kit has an awesome way to help le teach him. It makes it 100 percent easier and fun for the both of us.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! Fantastic, my daughter has become so interested in this. Untill this product we couldn't get her to focus for more than a minute or two. We are more than satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ty101

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in pieces
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this for my nephew because I have the toddler version for my son except once he opened up the box on Christmas Eve everything inside was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING kit. My daughter and I absolutely love this learning kit. It very easy to use and the "how-to" sheets are very informative. Only did 4 stars because the "printing board" arrived broken. Otherwise excellent program. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Tighe

customer_reviews.title: Ripped at the seam
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted the Teach My Toddler box and loved it! Because I was so happy with that, I decided to purchaser the Teach My Preschooler kit. Overall, I’m very happy with the contents of this pack, but was disappointed on how it arrived today. The back left seam of the Math fold was ripped. For that, I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver during pandemic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set at the beginning of the pandemic for my 3 year old son. We use it to learn receptive/ expressive skills, pronunciation, letter sounds and fine motor skills. Traceable shapes, letters and numbers are great. The Math sleeve has two sides, swing and slide, along with little counters for math visualization. Excellent product for teaching and learning.
customer_reviews.author: Mad consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the hands on activity for the kids (ie. the foam numbers, flash cards and the magnet board), but the booklets are a bit small and not as easily usable. It is nice that everything is organized in see thru envelopes and the plastic case makes access easy in our home classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and kids love these. My kids have learned new things quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: My three year old is loving this set. Currently we only do the reading, flash cards and writing board, but as she gets better with math we look forward to using that portion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic kit for my 3 1/2 year old who is very interested in numbers and letters. It will last is a long while a she moves more into math and reading!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Weird slip up with the books
customer_reviews.text: The product is great.... my issue and the reason for the 3 rating is that my a-i book is the exact same as j-r 😔 so now my son doesn’t have the readings and lessons for a-i
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for grandson
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for 5 year old grandson. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Lioness

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed with this version of the product. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not too impressed with this version of the product. It seems very cheaply made. I got teach my toddler and although that was cheaply made also it did the job. This one seems a little bit more difficult to use then teach my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan DiPillo

customer_reviews.title: Arrived already used and broken with undamaged shipping materials
customer_reviews.text: Product was greasy on the inside, writing board was smashed, tin was smashed, cards were scratched. Obviously used. Will update if seller fixes issue fairly.
customer_reviews.author: t-dazzle

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool
customer_reviews.text: This product really gets your toddler ready to learn and enjoy it. My little girl is asking "is it time to learn yet" and it really helps you keep the joy in it. My wife is great at spending tome with her and its only twenty minutes max a day. Benifits are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Luong

customer_reviews.title: Tracing pad arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The writing/tracing pad arrived broken and cracked in various places. I like the materials but I feel cheated having receiver a broken pad as now my child is not able to utilize the entire program. I would gladly adjust my review if I can get a replacement item.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Fun a lot of education material
customer_reviews.text: Impressed my toddler loves it we do 30 mins a day after prek school I can see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kit is a nice one to use if you can get your money worth.
customer_reviews.text: First time, the writing board completely broken. Screen wouldn't stay in at all. So I requested a replacement. I got a used, very dirty replacement. IT HAD HAIR IN IT!! Not all of my photos of the "replacement" will load. But I'm sure you can tell. Its nasty.
customer_reviews.author: Poling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very good way to get ready for kindergarten, I love how it's organized
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay...
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great but some of the items were broken when they arrived because some items are very cheaply made. My daughter wasn’t super into this and maybe I should’ve gotten the toddler one but this one says for 3 and up.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Mat

customer_reviews.title: My only wish was that it came with alphabet flash cards like the train numbers
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is learning faster with this program than he has with any other. The board to write on is a bit small for the transparencies to fit on but it hasn't bothered him yet. he really loves the number train. My only wish was that it came with alphabet flash cards like the train numbers.
customer_reviews.author: dansmommy

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for learning
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this with my 4 year old for a few months, and already see such an improvement in her abilities! She's learned many words, and can do all of the math that is in the package!
customer_reviews.author: kmaebyte

customer_reviews.title: Foam letters
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was nice and love the carrying kit. Lots of learning tools. Excited to start with my 3yr old!
customer_reviews.author: Kadie Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: I like it, it's perfect but there is a few ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it's perfect but there is a few things that made me not give it 5 stars. The fist one is that although I love that there was 2 sets of ABC's and numbers in one of the ABC's it was missing letters, the other one was full though. The little board is cute, but the pencil is loose it's not attached to the board like most magnetic boards which can be a big con since this is a preschooler kit and they tend to loose everything. Other than that I really like everything else, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing i home school my preschooler and this is so amazing hes finally understanding wrighting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great kit! My son loves when we have "school." He enjoys all the supplies and charts that it comes with. I love the drawing pad with the transparencies. Works great and easy for you to do with your child. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jewzie11

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to teach your babies before they start school, especially if you can't afford to put them through preschool, this is a great way to teach them.
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This product is a decent IF you also brought the teach my toddler. It focuses more on math.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Drew

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: Great set, I bought it to keep at grandma and grandpa's so we can keep up with fun learning while visiting. I consider it a good deal for the price and it serves a good purpose. Our daughter is 3.5.
customer_reviews.author: Story Collector

customer_reviews.title: Cheep Product
customer_reviews.text: Very Very small rolls differently not worth the money or the wait time to get it. You might as well rinse out and dry used paper instead of this crap (LOL).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Great package
customer_reviews.text: I think that is covers a lot for the price and has a bunch of different things that you can work with your child on. And as long as the pieces dont get lost or ruined you can pass it along to someone else when you child grows out of it.
customer_reviews.author: April Alexander

customer_reviews.title: The drawing board isn’t quality
customer_reviews.text: We are just getting around to opening this for our 5yr old daughter and when we opened it it was broken. Pretty disappointed in the quality of the magic drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: We LOVED toddler learning and I was so excited to start this one with my 2 year old but open opening it we noticed we don’t hsve any foam 1s :(
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: In the box comes with 3-4 thick plastic bag/cases with ...
customer_reviews.text: In the box comes with 3-4 thick plastic bag/cases with everything in it. I am really surprised how organized this set is. My 2 year old loves tracing letters on the sketch board!
customer_reviews.author: T.R.

customer_reviews.title: Obviously used set
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. Item was obviously already opened and played with. All the pieces seem to be there after digging through all the folders. Definitely not a new item
customer_reviews.author: Jen R.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Our 4-yr-old has been learning so much since receiving this kit. We will continue to work with him 2 hours per day. He is up to speed on where he should be & will be ready & preparedto start 4K this fall.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Autrey-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Seems really cheap, a lot of “stuff” that’s not really exciting for our preschooler. Writing board broke the same day we received it
customer_reviews.author: showe

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LEARNING TOOL FOR K
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter has learned so muchin sucha short time. She really enjoys it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Davies

customer_reviews.title: The writing pad was used
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old . The writing pad that came in it looked used and and broke almost instantly after my daughters using it.. a disappointment because I was looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Mendez

customer_reviews.title: My daughter said that it has a lot of good stuff and she was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This kit was purchased for my daughter to help teach her three little ones on her spare time. My daughter said that it has a lot of good stuff and she was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia W

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my nephew's birthday. He LOVED the Teach My Toddler kit. I was so excited to get this one, opened it, and the Magic Board was broken. I returned that one, ordered a replacement and that too was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Wagner

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PACK!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest preschool pack. It comes with everything you need. The drawing board was a selling point for me. It makes it fun for my kiddo. I have recommended this to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Rosevear (McGrath)

customer_reviews.title: They have been great for learning and the kids have fun using them
customer_reviews.text: I now have the whole collection of all their kits. I ordered each one when my kids were ready. They have been great for learning and the kids have fun using them.
customer_reviews.author: MomOD

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew's 3rd birthday. He was mostly excited about the dry erase board but my sister says the kit is useful and fun. I love that it is so inexpensive!
customer_reviews.author: MamaB1987

customer_reviews.title: Learn and build confidence all at once!
customer_reviews.text: This kit was perfect for my preschool age child. It's designed to teach gradually so it doesn't overwhelm you child which helps build confidence! This kit is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! My son is exited every day for his "school time"!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke writing board disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these and both time the writing borad was broke the plastic around it is completely broke everything else is awesome but very dissatisfied with having two and both boards broke won't order again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The kit is amazing; it's filled with tons of learning activities. Great price! Grandson loves the activities.
customer_reviews.author: Tyanna N Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed. First time opening the printing section and the sketch board was completely broken and in pieces. Now i have a very upset 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Rivera

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is so awesome! I love that we can do it together or she can do it on her own! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Teach My Preschooler
product_meta.description:
100% SCREEN FREE! Learn to read with 10 step readers matching reading flashcards and a reward tin Practice printing letters numbers to 100 and names with a magic drawing board and transparencies Teach numbers to 100 with a flashcard number train to 100 matching circus book and foam numbers Start adding and subtracting with a poster game flip book foam numbers and counters 70+ pieces and teaching guides to easily teach reading printing numbers to 100 adding & subtracting Need a Spanish teaching guide? Email CustomerService@teachmy

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Teach My Preschooler is the multi award-winning all-in-one learning kit for preschoolers age 3 years+. Requiring no screens, the kit has everything for teaching preschoolers the basics. Teach My Preschooler is divided into four sections: Reading, Printing, Numbers to 100, Adding and Subtracting. Developed with education consultant, Judith Rowlands, M Ed., Teach My Preschooler is designed to give preschoolers a head start, develop fine motor skills, encourage parent/child interaction and increase school readiness skills.
feature_bullets: Learn to read with 10 step readers, matching reading flashcards and a reward tin.
Practice printing letters, numbers to 100 and names with a magic drawing board and transparencies.
Teach numbers to 100 with a flashcard number train to 100, matching circus book and foam numbers
Start adding and subtracting with a poster game, flip book, foam numbers and counters.
70+ pieces and teaching guides to easily teach reading, printing, numbers to 100, adding & subtracting.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
